	template <
		class SrcPtr1,
		class SrcPtr2
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr1>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr2>::ptr_type, :ref:`maximum<doxid-d4/d31/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1maximum>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr1>::value_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr2>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`max_<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gae41470dd8d5f61c2020ab8672a483838>`(
		const SrcPtr1& src1,
		const SrcPtr2& src2
		);

	:target:`maxVal_<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga84304ffdf1361fe076ec78d18d9b9e49>`(const SrcPtr& src);

	template <
		class SrcPtr1,
		class SrcPtr2
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr1>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr2>::ptr_type, :ref:`minimum<doxid-d5/dc9/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1minimum>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr1>::value_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr2>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`min_<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gad03ebd56c9351013f5bb957a585f7137>`(
		const SrcPtr1& src1,
		const SrcPtr2& src2
		);

	template <class SrcPtr>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`FindMinMaxValExprBody<doxid-d8/d65/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_find_min_max_val_expr_body>`<SrcPtr>>

	:target:`minVal_<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gaba7fa397fed60ac4af5595a4dce4d92a>`(const SrcPtr& src);

	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`not_equal_to<doxid-df/d9f/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1not__equal__to>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<T, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator!=<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga61134a26d4c0e5ca4467638109358eaa>`(
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body>& src1,

		);

	template <
		typename T,
		class Body
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, :ref:`not_equal_to<doxid-df/d9f/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1not__equal__to>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<T, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator!=<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gac01068a2f43c82f8e14d0ac68996c903>`(

	template <typename T>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder2nd<doxid-d3/dae/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder2nd>`<:ref:`not_equal_to<doxid-df/d9f/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1not__equal__to>`<T>>>>
	:target:`operator!=<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga00b76efa5a61126d47883ddbf36799f0>`(

		);

	template <typename T>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder1st<doxid-d4/dc8/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder1st>`<:ref:`not_equal_to<doxid-df/d9f/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1not__equal__to>`<T>>>>

	template <
		class Body1,
		class Body2
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::ptr_type, :ref:`not_equal_to<doxid-df/d9f/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1not__equal__to>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::value_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator!=<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gaa295a03a44435b12c5b2ce66bf4c1d8d>`(

	template <
		typename T,
		class Body
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<T>>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, :ref:`modulus<doxid-d7/d7f/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1modulus>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<T, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator%<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga82bdb4bd976961e8077c200d91a371e3>`(

	template <
		typename T,
		class Body
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`logical_and<doxid-d7/de9/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1logical__and>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<T, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator&&<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gaa883a73a52c65d1e648c2f8844352ceb>`(

		const :ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<T>& src2
		);

	template <
		typename T,

	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder2nd<doxid-d3/dae/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder2nd>`<:ref:`multiplies<doxid-d3/da3/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1multiplies>`<T>>>>
	:target:`operator*<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga1c7c955caf1909eb3c94363e1c7d3cb5>`(
		const :ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>& src,
		T val
		);

	template <typename T>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder1st<doxid-d4/dc8/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder1st>`<:ref:`multiplies<doxid-d3/da3/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1multiplies>`<T>>>>

		T val,
		const :ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>& src
		);

	template <
		class Body1,
		class Body2
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::ptr_type, :ref:`multiplies<doxid-d3/da3/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1multiplies>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::value_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator*<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga43ee6bae7bda7ed2faf47b555790cb71>`(
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body1>& a,
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body2>& b
		);

	template <class Body>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder2nd<doxid-d3/dae/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder2nd>`<:ref:`multiplies<doxid-d3/da3/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1multiplies>`<typename Body::value_type>>>>
	:target:`operator*<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga02baabd5114aa4d102ed246afc6ce624>`(

		const :ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<T>& src,

		);

	template <class Body>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder1st<doxid-d4/dc8/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder1st>`<:ref:`divides<doxid-de/d2a/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1divides>`<typename Body::value_type>>>>
	:target:`operator/<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga63c10edfae5414877b679eeb58c9f4a7>`(
		typename Body::value_type val,
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body>& a
		);

	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<T>>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`GlobPtrSz<doxid-d2/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_glob_ptr_sz>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`divides<doxid-de/d2a/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1divides>`<T>>>
	:target:`operator/<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga906b0deabff7997bb4d80ae166a137c3>`(
		const :ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<T>& src1,
		const :ref:`GlobPtrSz<doxid-d2/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_glob_ptr_sz>`<T>& src2
		);

	template <typename T>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`divides<doxid-de/d2a/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1divides>`<T>>>

	:target:`operator<<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gaa80300a972f7a420a010418c5deba9ca>`(
		const :ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<T>& src,
		T val
		);

	template <
		class Body1,
		class Body2
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::ptr_type, :ref:`less<doxid-d0/d04/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1less>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::value_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator<<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gad2d5efdf0de121487a6c531f99a6aaef>`(
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body1>& a,

		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body>& src1,

		);

	template <class Body>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder1st<doxid-d4/dc8/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder1st>`<:ref:`equal_to<doxid-d2/dfd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1equal__to>`<typename Body::value_type>>>>
	:target:`operator==<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gaada7b6cc4a40099563d92a21677659e0>`(
		typename Body::value_type val,
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body>& a
		);

	template <
		typename T,
		class Body
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`GlobPtrSz<doxid-d2/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_glob_ptr_sz>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`equal_to<doxid-d2/dfd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1equal__to>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<T, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator==<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga10206e51eb5cf79fc73525e83b18b74a>`(
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body>& src1,
		const :ref:`GlobPtrSz<doxid-d2/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_glob_ptr_sz>`<T>& src2
		);

	template <
		class Body1,
		class Body2
		>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::ptr_type, :ref:`equal_to<doxid-d2/dfd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1equal__to>`<typename :ref:`LargerType<doxid-de/d33/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_larger_type>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body1>::value_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<Body2>::value_type>::type>>>
	:target:`operator==<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gadd3fb8521b5e67d3ff9ab4a7e1afad12>`(
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body1>& a,
		const :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<Body2>& b
		);

	template <typename T>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder2nd<doxid-d3/dae/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder2nd>`<:ref:`equal_to<doxid-d2/dfd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1equal__to>`<T>>>>
	:target:`operator==<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga6fc754b6f5b8565f33507efb2275bfb6>`(
		const :ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>& src,
		T val
		);

	template <typename T>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`GlobPtrSz<doxid-d2/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_glob_ptr_sz>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder1st<doxid-d4/dc8/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder1st>`<:ref:`bit_rshift<doxid-d4/d2a/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1bit__rshift>`<T>>>>
	:target:`operator>><doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga2a685b4cdb4af2a8d7a68fbfcd8e2548>`(
		T val,
		const :ref:`GlobPtrSz<doxid-d2/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_glob_ptr_sz>`<T>& src
		);

	template <
		class Body1,
		class Body2
		>

	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`BinaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d8/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`Texture<doxid-d0/d28/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_texture>`<T>>::ptr_type, typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<:ref:`GlobPtrSz<doxid-d2/d19/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_glob_ptr_sz>`<T>>::ptr_type, :ref:`logical_or<doxid-d3/db2/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1logical__or>`<T>>>

	static
	__host__ :ref:`PerspectiveMapPtrSz<doxid-d9/df4/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_perspective_map_ptr_sz>`
	:target:`perspectiveMap<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1ga9d9fb685753febcac788c82f2375f45c>`(
		:ref:`Size<doxid-dc/d84/group__core__basic_1ga346f563897249351a34549137c8532a0>` dstSize,
		const :ref:`GpuMat_<doxid-d6/d0a/classcv_1_1cudev_1_1_gpu_mat__>`<float>& warpMat

	template <class SrcPtr>
	__host__ :ref:`Expr<doxid-db/dcd/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_expr>`<:ref:`UnaryTransformPtrSz<doxid-d2/dc1/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_unary_transform_ptr_sz>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr>::ptr_type, :ref:`Binder2nd<doxid-d3/dae/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_binder2nd>`<:ref:`pow_func<doxid-da/dda/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1pow__func>`<typename :ref:`PtrTraits<doxid-d3/d5c/structcv_1_1cudev_1_1_ptr_traits>`<SrcPtr>::value_type>>>>
	:target:`pow_<doxid-df/dfc/group__cudev_1gaa69bd5c46cef6040c304293356b69151>`(
		const SrcPtr& src,
		float power
		);

	template <class SrcPtr>

		const Op& op
